UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: The New Antimicrobial Peptide SpHyastatin from the Mud Crab Scylla paramamosain with Multiple Antimicrobial Mechanisms and High Effect on Bacterial Infection.
Literature.Author: Shan Z, Zhu K, Peng H, Chen B, Liu J, Chen F, Ma X, Wang S, Qiao K, Wang K

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli CGMCC 1.2389(MIC=>37µM),Vibrio parahaemolyticus CGMCC 1.1615(MIC=>37µM),Vibrio alginolyticus CGMCC 1.1833(MIC=>37µM),Vibrio harveyi CGMCC 1.1593(MIC=>37µM),Vibrio fluvialis CGMCC 1.1609(MIC=>37µM),Pseudomonas stutzeri CGMCC 1.1803(MIC=>37µM),Pseudomonas fluorescens CGMCC 1.0032(MIC=25-37µM),Aeromonas hydrophila CGMCC 1.2017(MIC=>37µM),Shigella flexneri CGMCC 1.1868(MIC=>37µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa CGMCC 1.0205(MIC=>37µM),Bacillus subtilis CGMCC 1.108(MIC=>37µM),Bacillus cereus CGMCC 1.447(MIC=>37µM),Micrococcus luteus CGMCC 1.634(MIC=25-37µM),Staphylococcus aureus CGMCC 1.363(MIC=>37µM),Corynebacterium glutamicum CGMCC 1.1886(MIC=25-37µM),Micrococcus luteus(MIC=>37µM)
